name: HURRY!
description:
warning: some things got messed up when i exported, and the tasks don't show up anymore, i have no idea how to fix this, i'm really sorry!

Instead, I'll put a detailed description. The game starts when your character wakes up, and after the intro scene, your goal is to complete the 2 tasks to get your character ready for the day. If you walk to the right of the screen, (using the D key) you can go through the rooms of the house, and get to the bathroom to brush your teeth, which is the first task. To start brushing your teeth, walk to the sink, (using the A and D keys) and press SPACE to start the action. In the teeth minigame, you have to move your mouse over the teeth that are green, and hold down the left mouse button. After you do that, walk further to the right and you'll eventually get to the next task, which is choosing a shirt. Walk to the wardrobe and press space to start the action. Then, you can either click on the green shirt or the blue shirt. After you have brushed your teeth and chosen a shirt, the next section of the game begins. You get sent back to your bed, and have to click the restart button (should be either a green flag or an arrow) and after you click it, the day restarts. You will have to do the same 2 tasks again, but now there is a time limit. If you do the tasks within the time limit, you win. If you don't, the day restarts again and you get another chance to do the 2 tasks within the time limit.

CONTROLS!

move using "A" and "D"

interact with things using "SPACE" when you are near the object

CLICK and HOLD on the teeth to clean them.
